title: Trump hits out at reports that top US general warned against attacking Iran
summary_full: General Dan Caine has warned that strikes against Iran could be risky, potentially drawing the US into a prolonged conflict, US media report.
summary_public: General Dan Caine has warned that strikes against Iran could be risky, potentially drawing the US into a prolonged conflict, US media report.

IR.label: neutral
IR.evidence: Trump hits out at reports that top US general warned against attacking Iran
